name: Shoshinshakara Nippon Ichi Made: Flash Anzan
name_original: Shoshinshakara Nippon Ichi Made: Flash Anzan
description:
Shoshinshakara Nippon Ichi Made: Flash Anzan is an educational game developed by Klon. It was originally released in 2013.
You can play Shoshinshakara Nippon Ichi Made: Flash Anzan on Nintendo 3DS.
